item.title: ::kill command
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

This is the code i have so far:

if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights > 1) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerName.currentHealth = 0; sM("You have killed "+p.playerName+"!"); yell("An admin has killed "+p.playerName+"!"); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to kill.."); } }

But when i try and compile, i get this error:

client.java:7514: cannot find symbol symbol : variable currentHealth location: class java.lang.String p.playerName.currentHealth = 0; ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Could anyone help please?

Read full topic
